result.eng: A light coolness lingered in the air which tingled her skin and sharpened her creativity.
result.ga: D'fhan fionnuaire éadrom san aer a chuir dinglis ar a craiceann agus faobhar ar a cruthaíocht
result.orig: D'fhan fionnuaire éadrom san aer a chuir dinglis ar a craiceann agus faobhar ar a cruthaíocht
result.html: D'fhan fionnuaire éadrom san aer a chuir dinglis ar a craiceann agus faobhar ar a cruthaíochtA light coolness lingered in the air which tingled her skin and sharpened her creativity.
result.ponchtml: D'ḟan fionnuaire éadrom san aer a ċuir dinglis ar a craiceann agus faoḃar ar a cruṫaíoċtA light coolness lingered in the air which tingled her skin and sharpened her creativity.

result.eng: She was excited: she was working in the most pioneering café in Ireland.
result.ga: Bhí dinglis pléisiúir uirthi bhí sí ag obair sa chaife ba cheannródaí in Éirinn
result.orig: Bhí dinglis pléisiúir uirthi bhí sí ag obair sa chaife ba cheannródaí in Éirinn
result.html: Bhí dinglis pléisiúir uirthi bhí sí ag obair sa chaife ba cheannródaí in ÉirinnShe was excited: she was working in the most pioneering café in Ireland.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí dinglis pléisiúir uirṫi ḃí sí ag obair sa ċaife ba ċeannródaí in ÉirinnShe was excited: she was working in the most pioneering café in Ireland.
